posts.title: Signature Product
posts.base_prompt: Luxury perfume product photography: Emerald green glass perfume bottle with gold cap on white marble surface, soft diffused studio lighting, minimalist composition, negative space in upper third for text, professional commercial photography, 1:1 square format, ultra high quality
posts.kontext_prompt: Add the Perfume Oasis logo as a subtle watermark in the bottom right corner at 25% opacity, ensure bottle color is exactly emerald green #0E5C4A, add subtle gold #C8A95B reflection on cap, maintain minimalist luxury aesthetic
posts.gpt_branded_prompt: Luxury perfume product photography: Emerald green #0E5C4A glass perfume bottle with gold #C8A95B cap on white marble, Perfume Oasis branding visible as subtle watermark, soft studio lighting, minimalist composition with space for text, professional commercial photography, 1:1 square format
posts.branding_intent: Subtle logo watermark, exact brand colors, Instagram-ready

posts.title: Artisan Heritage
posts.base_prompt: Elegant perfume flat lay: Crystal perfume bottle surrounded by fresh white jasmine flowers, vintage gold perfumer tools, on textured cream linen background, overhead shot, warm natural lighting, artisanal luxury aesthetic, 1:1 square format
posts.kontext_prompt: Place the Perfume Oasis logo embossed on the perfume bottle cap in gold, transform background to exact sand color #F6F3EF, ensure gold tools match brand gold #C8A95B, create cohesive heritage brand story
posts.gpt_branded_prompt: Artisan perfume flat lay: Crystal bottle with embossed Perfume Oasis logo on cap, surrounded by jasmine flowers and gold #C8A95B perfumer tools on sand #F6F3EF linen background, overhead shot, heritage luxury branding, warm lighting, 1:1 square format
posts.branding_intent: Logo embossed on product, full brand palette, heritage storytelling

posts.title: Modern Campaign
posts.base_prompt: Contemporary luxury perfume scene: Sleek perfume bottle on modern minimalist vanity, soft morning light through sheer curtains, clean aesthetic with geometric gold accents, lifestyle photography, bright and airy, 1:1 square format
posts.kontext_prompt: Integrate the Perfume Oasis logo as a subtle reflection on the vanity surface, transform bottle to emerald #0E5C4A, add gold #C8A95B geometric accents, ensure modern yet luxurious brand presence
posts.gpt_branded_prompt: Modern luxury perfume lifestyle: Emerald #0E5C4A Perfume Oasis bottle on minimalist vanity with brand logo reflection, gold #C8A95B geometric accents, soft morning light, contemporary luxury aesthetic, clean composition, 1:1 square format
posts.branding_intent: Environmental logo integration, modern luxury, lifestyle branding
